title: Lancashire takes action to close parking loophole (Lancashire County Council)
text: ( Source : Lancashire County Council ) Tuesday, 13th October 2015 (PR15/0446) Lancashire County Council has agreed to tighten up on parking enforcement to stop people who park illegally getting away with it by driving away before receiving a
